summary: Increases the volume of the heartbeat caused by low health for more immersion.
descriptionHtml:
==============
Loud Heartbeat
by: muhfukka
==============


What it does
============

Simple little mod that increases the volume of the heartbeat caused by low health for more immersion.
In the heat of the fight we do not often hear from our heart because of volume effects and music. Now your heart will be stronger in the NMS need your chest when fighting with a dangerous opponent.


Description
============

There are three levels of volume fashion - 6, 9 and 12 dB from vanilla Skyrim. I play with a maximum volume of 12 dB, but if you care about the frequency distortion caused by the increased volume, select 6 or 9 dB.
Also archive contains a folder with vanilla sounds, if you want to compare.


Installation
=============

Choose from three levels of volume - 6, 9, or 12 dB, and copy to folder Skyrimdata


Uninstallation
==============

Delete next files
ui_health_heartbeat_a_lp.wav
ui_health_heartbeat_b_lp.wav
in the next folder
Skyrimdatasoundfxuihealthheartbeat


Thanks
======

Google Translator


CHECK ALSO
===========

My another little sound mod

Your SOUL is MINE
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49706/?

Adds famous Shan Tsung voiced phrase(s) Your SOUL is MINE from Mortal Combat movie/videogame when you are trappin a soul into a gem and/or absorbing a dragon soul. Get unmatched pleasure of exciting gameplay with each soul.
No scripts or ESP needed.
author: muhfukka
